text: Utku Yuvakuran (born November 2, 1997) is a Turkish footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Beşiktaş. ==Professional career== Utku made his professional debut with Beşiktaş in a 1-1 Turkish Cup tie with Kayserispor on 26 January 2017. ==Career statistics== As of 24 December 2019. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="3"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Beylerbeyi |2015–16 |35||0||1||0||0||0||36||0 |- ! Total !! 35 !! 0 !! 1 !! 0 !! 0 !! 0 !! 36 !! 0 |- |rowspan="5" valign="center"|Beşiktaş |2016–17 |0||0||2||0||0||0||2||0 |- |2017–18 |0||0||1||0||0||0||1||0 |- |2018–19 |1||0||0||0||1||0||2||0 |- |2019–20 |1||0||2||0||1||0||4||0 |- ! Total !! 2 !! 0 !! 5 !! 0 !! 2 !! 0 !! 9 !! 0 |- ! colspan=2 | Career total !37!!0!!6!!0!!2!!0!!45!!0 |} ==Personal life== Utku is the son of Semih Yuvakuran, a former Turkish international footballer. He is one of three triplets, all whom are footballers. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkey under-21 international footballers Category:Turkey youth international footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:TFF Third League players Category:Süper Lig players Category:Beylerbeyi S.K. footballers Category:Beşiktaş J.K. footballers
